english.segment1: Verse 1. Far away, I feel your beating heart. All alone, beneath the crystal stars. Staring into space, what a lonely face. I'll try to find my place with you
english.segment2: Chorus. What a beautiful smile. Can I stay for awhile. On this beautiful night. We'll make everything right. My beautiful love
english.segment3: Verse 2. Larger than the moon, my love for you. Worlds collide, as heaven pulls us through. The secret of the world is written in the stars. I'm carrying your heart in mine
english.segment4: Chorus. What a beautiful smile. Can I stay for awhile. On this beautiful night. We'll make everything right. My beautiful love
english.segment5: Bridge. Maybe a greater thing will happen. Maybe all will see. Maybe our love will catch like fire. As it burns through me
